Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 2 from any)
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and can take elf and half-elf feats
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Diplomacy: +7 (charisma; trained) Religion: +6 (wisdom; trained)
Acrobatics: +5 (dexterity; trained) Intimidation: +3 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained)
Alcohol Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Legal Lore: +6 (intelligence; trained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +2 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +5 (dexterity; trained)

Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 9 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Thief: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Legendary Thief: Can use Steal with a -5 penalty when hidden to take actively wielded and highly noticeable items
Pickpocket: Can attempt to Steal a closely-guarded object without penalty/Can use 2 actions to attempt to Steal with a -5 penalty from an alert creature
Quick Unlock: Can Pick A Lock in 1 action
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Subtle Theft: Successful Steal inflicts -2 Perception on observers to detect/Remains undetected when using Palm An Object or Steal after a successful Create A Diversion
Combat
Hit Points: 24 Armor Class: 15 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against the triggering attack when unencumbered
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a flat-footed foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts flat-footed vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Unbalancing Blow: Critical hits inflict flat-footed vs. self attacks until the end of the next turn
Wary Disarmament: +2 Armor Class vs. a trap triggered while disarming it
Save: Fortitude: +4 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Wary Disarmament: +2 saves vs. a trap triggered while disarming it
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 5 allocated
Legendary Thief Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 15, thievery rank (currently 4) >= 4 and pickpocket feature (currently 1)
Quick Unlock Feat: Requires level (currently 2) >= 7 and thievery rank (currently 4) >= 3
